ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Played a little last night.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m positive this is happening.  It was happening constantly. And I could reproduce it.  I encourage others to test elemental in particular.  Not
ygData.messageBody:
> Sounds like a bug. It should only be happening with Niv's, as
> that's the only song that's supposed to have a spell damage
> shield (once the shield absorbs the damage, the shield/song
> drops). If it's happening with other resist songs, I'd /bug
> it.

I'm positive this is happening. It was happening constantly.
And I could reproduce it. I encourage others to test elemental
in particular. Not purifying. Not guardian. It happens on
mystic shielding sometimes too.

> I was doing this to help some friends a couple days ago. I
> had no problems with it. There are some cases (usually when a
> DoT is in effect) where charm will not wipe the damage
> history. There's speculation too that it's only effective
> about 90% of the time at wiping the damage list.

I am extremely efficient at twinking exp for people. I noticed
I couldn't do it last night. But I'll check again. I ran three
tests, so it hard to be a coincidence three times.

Harmonic.
